thread.title: Archbishop of Canterbury sorry for beatings at church camp
thread.title_full: Archbishop of Canterbury sorry for beatings at church camp

title: Archbishop of Canterbury sorry for beatings at church camp
text: Archbishop of Canterbury issues 'unreserved and unequivocal' apology after admitting he worked at summer camps where teenage boys were groomed for abuse Justin Welby apologised on behalf of Church of England over the camp beatings John Smyth QC, head of Iwerne Trust, subjected boys 'sado-masochistic' attacks The boys, from some of Britain's top public were schools, left with life-long scars Allegations were revealed by Channel 4 News but were first uncovered in 1982 Neither the church or top Winchester College, were some boys went, told police
